text: Aarti also spelled arti, arati, arathi, aarthi (In Devanagari: ) is a Hindu religious ritual. Worshippers offer light to the gods or goddess and sing praise to them. Aarti is usually contains a holder, which they put fire or flame in and it is part of a puja. == References == Category:Religious behavior and experience Category:Hinduism Category:Indian music
title: Arti (Hinduism)
